user_story: As a mobile app user, I want to to manage my bank account  so that so i can send and receive amount .
generated_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to send and receive amounts from their bank account.
2. The system shall provide clear feedback confirming the success or failure of each transaction.
3. The system shall validate user inputs for sending and receiving amounts and display relevant error messages for invalid entries.
4. The system shall handle errors, such as network issues or insufficient funds, without crashing and provide appropriate user notifications.
